nutrients.name: Nitrogen (N)
nutrients.recommendations: Apply Nitrogen fertilizer according to crop needs. e.g., Urea, Ammonium Nitrate, Nitrate of Soda

nutrients.name: Phosphorus (P)
nutrients.recommendations: Apply Phosphorus fertilizer e.g., Triple Super Phosphate, Monoammonium Phosphate (MAP), DMBL Ruiru NPK fertilizer

nutrients.name: Potassium (K)
nutrients.recommendations: Apply Potassium fertilizer e.g., Potassium Nitrate, Sulfate of Potash

nutrients.name: Calcium (Ca)
nutrients.recommendations: Apply lime to increase Calcium levels and improve soil structure e.g., Calcium Ammonium Nitrate (CAN), Calcium Carbonate, Calcium Nitrate

nutrients.name: Magnesium (Mg)
nutrients.recommendations: Apply magnesium sulfate e.g., Magnesium Oxide, Magnesium Sulfate

nutrients.name: Soil pH
nutrients.recommendations: Apply lime to raise pH e.g., Ammonium Nitrate, Calcium Carbonate

nutrients.name: Organic Matter
nutrients.recommendations: Add compost manure and other organic materials to enhance soil e.g., Phosphorus Fertilizers, Balanced NPK Fertilizers
